fields.name: AzureBlob
fields.description: Parameters to reconcile to the AzureBlob source kind type.

fields.name: Bucket
fields.description: Parameters to reconcile to the Bucket source kind type.

fields.name: ComplianceState
fields.description: Combined status of the Flux Kubernetes resources created by the fluxConfiguration or created by the managed objects.

fields.name: ConfigurationProtectedSettings
fields.description: Key-value pairs of protected configuration settings for the configuration

fields.name: ErrorMessage
fields.description: Error message returned to the user in the case of provisioning failure.

fields.name: GitRepository
fields.description: Parameters to reconcile to the GitRepository source kind type.

fields.name: Kustomizations
fields.description: Array of kustomizations used to reconcile the artifact pulled by the source type on the cluster.

fields.name: Namespace
fields.description: The namespace to which this configuration is installed to. Maximum of 253 lower case alphanumeric characters, hyphen and period only.

fields.name: ReconciliationWaitDuration
fields.description: Maximum duration to wait for flux configuration reconciliation. E.g PT1H, PT5M, P1D

fields.name: RepositoryPublicKey
fields.description: Public Key associated with this fluxConfiguration (either generated within the cluster or provided by the user).

fields.name: Scope
fields.description: Scope at which the operator will be installed.

fields.name: SourceKind
fields.description: Source Kind to pull the configuration data from.

fields.name: SourceSyncedCommitId
fields.description: Branch and/or SHA of the source commit synced with the cluster.

fields.name: SourceUpdatedAt
fields.description: Datetime the fluxConfiguration synced its source on the cluster.

fields.name: StatusUpdatedAt
fields.description: Datetime the fluxConfiguration synced its status on the cluster with Azure.

fields.name: Statuses
fields.description: Statuses of the Flux Kubernetes resources created by the fluxConfiguration or created by the managed objects provisioned by the fluxConfiguration.

fields.name: Suspend
fields.description: Whether this configuration should suspend its reconciliation of its kustomizations and sources.

fields.name: WaitForReconciliation
fields.description: Whether flux configuration deployment should wait for cluster to reconcile the kustomizations.
